description:
With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Jonouchi transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer?  Dazed and confused, can Jonouchi master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai’s Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?  And even if Jonouchi wins, Mai’s soul will be sent into the ether!  It’s a no-win situation!
Source: crunchyroll
